description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the 'Orders Overview' screen used by a manager in a meal ordering platform. It includes UI components such as app bars, headers, notes, and styling themes tailored for the manager's overview functionality.

classes.name: ManagerOrdersOverviewScreen
classes.description: StatelessWidget representing the main orders overview screen for managers.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: StatelessWidget for rendering header section with title and icon.

classes.name: _Note
classes.description: StatelessWidget for rendering informational notes within the screen.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each class, including layout and styling.
